ygData.subject: Re: Bards in Unrest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If any of you have ever been to the Minotaur caves in Steamfront, is it me - or are the walls there only solid to player eyes? I ll be walking through one
ygData.messageBody:
> > thing I know she zaps me for 300+ hit points and I'm dead. If there is a
> > bug with the axis whatever is it something that Verant is aware of and is
> > working on fixing?

If any of you have ever been to the Minotaur caves in Steamfront, is it me
- or are the walls there only solid to player eyes? I'll be walking through
one of the tunnels and all the sudden Meldrath or whatever his name is - is
casting a spell on me, but isn't anywhere around. Or I'll be fighting a
mino in one hall and a mino in another hall will make a beeline around the
corner and down the hallway to join in. (Or sometimes, quite often -
they'll just walk through the walls to start fighting you.)

That's one of the (second only to the boats) buggiest places I've found so far.

--
